modules.description: Provides macros to generate conversion functions between record types with minor differences, handling field mappings and type coercions automatically. Works with OCaml record types and variant types, supporting field renaming and type adjustments. Enables efficient conversion between similar types in protocols or data models where manual mapping would be verbose.

Provides functions to generate attributes and derive stable converters for record and variant types. Works with OCaml type definitions and location information to track changes in data structures. Used to enforce consistent serialization formats across different versions of a type.
